name: Cannibal Cookout: Link Up
description:
This is the sister game to the hugely popular Cannibal Cookout. Test your reaction and agility in this addictive Match 3 game, as you race to complete the level before your time is up. Earn gold and skulls that can be transferred straight into Cannibal Cookout and spent at the General Store. Use awesome power-ups to help you along, and play through numerous levels as you try your hardest to master the game.

💀 Earn gold and skulls to spend in Cannibal Cookout.
💀 Cannibal Cookout theme and music.
💀 Easy to learn, yet hard to master.
💀 Awesome power ups.
💀 Cascading combos helping you achieve massive scores, lots of gold and sacks of skulls!

A unique and fun way to extend your Cannibal Cookout experience!

GUARANTEE

The loyalty and trust of our customers is very important to us. If you are not completely satisfied with a MeYuMe product then please contact us at meyume-games@xtremics.biz.

JOIN US!

☆ Twitter: http://twitter.com/MeYuMeApps
☆ Tweet: @MeYuMeApps

GAME PLAY

Match 3 games are puzzle games. You need to match 3 or more objects by exchanging two pieces in a horizontal or vertical direction. Matched pieces are removed from the board and new pieces dropped back onto the board. The object is to clear the board and advance to the next level. Matching more than 4 pieces can trigger the spawning of power ups with special abilities, helping you clear larger areas of the board.

Massive scores can be quickly achieved by chaining together the matches, these are called cascading combos. Each new combo results in an increase in the score multiplier and continues until there are no more matches for that combo run.

If you're unsure of the next move then you can rotate a quadrant of the board by pressing one of the rotate buttons that are situated in each corner of the board.
